title: Bibimbap (Korean rice with mixed vegetables)
ingredients: ['1 cucumber, sliced into matchsticks', '55g (about 4 tablespoons) gochujang (Korean hot pepper paste)', '1 bunch fresh spinach, sliced', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '2 carrots, sliced into matchsticks', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 pinch chilli flakes', '450g thinly-sliced sirloin steak', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '4 large eggs', '630g cooked white rice', '4 teaspoons toasted sesame oil, divided', '1 teaspoon sesame seeds', '2 teaspoons gochujang (Korean hot pepper paste), divided (optional)']
